May instead be activated as an action without making a check Mod.

Add [SE] to enemy interception or deciphering check

Add [SE] to enemy checks to intercept outgoing transmissions.
Add [BO] to intercept HoloNet traffic

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Environmental Simulators[h3] Please see page 64 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Can replicate up to three different planetary environments, one at a time. When making Charm or Negotiation checks against members of species native to replicated environment, add an automatic [AD][AD] to pool.
Additional planetary environment

Mod.MiscDesc: Anyone working on internal systems, such as power systems, hyperdrive, computers, sensors, gain [BOOST] to Mechanics and Computer checks due to the ease of reaching such typically hidden systems.

ItemAttachment.Name: Space Slug Abilities

Mod.MiscDesc: When rolling for initiative, or attacking with its Insatiable Maw, a space slug rolls a [B]Coordination skill check[b], counting as having Coordination 3 and Agility 1 ([PR][AB][AB]).

A starship of silhouette 5 or lower attacked by a space slug, regardless of whether or not the attack hit, must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Space) check[b] to avoid being swallowed. If swallowed, ship suffers 10 hull trauma daily from being digested.
The stomach of an space slug is also generally home to mynocks, which will waste no time attacking a swallowed starship.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Briefing Auditorium[h3] Please see page 58 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Buoy can be set to transmit a distress signal or other data.
A character operating ship sensors must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to identify that the buoy is not an actual ship.
After being jettisoned, buoy no longer counts as being attached to the ship until it is reattached.
Add [SE] to Computers checks to identify the buoy

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Encrypted Computer[h3] Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrade difficulty of all Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer system once.
Add [SE] to Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer systems

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Droid Brain Defense System[h3] See page 53 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.

Adds [BO] to Mechanics checks.

Talk with your GM about which degradation to choose for your vehicle.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Whenever the vehicle suffers system strain, it suffers one additional point of system strain
A [DE] on a piloting checks to control the vehicle causes the vehicle to immediately drop to Speed 0
A [DE] when using any of the vehicle's inbuilt systems or attachments cause the system or attachment to fail for the remainder of the encounter

[B]Intellect Tract[b]: Once per day, may upgrade an Intellect-related check by two steps
